sourcesContent:
<template>
  <transition name="fade">
    <slot></slot>
  </transition>
</template>

<script setup>
const props = defineProps({
  duration: {
    type: Number,
    required: false,
    default: 0.3,
  },
});
</script>

<style scoped>
.fade-enter-from {
  opacity: 0;
}

.fade-enter-active {
  transition: opacity v-bind(duration + 's') ease;
}

.fade-enter-to {
  opacity: 1;
}
</style>
